metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9976 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The Boa server configuration on DASAN H660RM devices with firmware1.03-0022 logs POST data to the /tmp/boa-temp file, which allows logged-inusers to read the credentials of administration web interface users.

criterions.comment: boa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
